birdnetTools 0.0.0.9000

Package index

Data Import

birdnet_combine()
Group BirdNET output files

Exploring and Preparing Data

birdnet_filter()
Filter BirdNET output data by species, confidence, date, and time
birdnet_heatmap()
Create a heatmap of BirdNET detections by hour and date
birdnet_add_datetime()
Add datetime-related columns from BirdNET output filenames

Validating and Getting Threshold

birdnet_subsample()
Subsample BirdNET detections by species
birdnet_launch_validation()
Launch the BirdNET audio validation app
birdnet_calc_threshold()
Calculate species-specific confidence thresholds for BirdNET detections

Helper Functions

birdnet_filter_species()
Filter data by species
birdnet_filter_threshold()
Filter data by confidence threshold
birdnet_filter_year()
Filter data by year
birdnet_filter_date_range()
Filter data by date range
birdnet_filter_hour()
Filter data by hour

Dataset

example_jprf_2023
Example BirdNET selection table from John Prince Research Forest
